comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: P-38F serial 42-12621 of the 39th Fighter Squadron, 35th FG.

comment.author: 89986708@N06
comment._content: P-38F-3-LO S/N 42-12621 flown by Capt. Curran "Jack" Jones of 39th FS/35th FG, an ace credited with 5 victories- first was achieved when Jones flew a P-39 'Airacobra' (it was an 'Zero' piloted by 15-victory navy ace WO Satoshi Yoshino) and next four when was flying this A/C during the battle of the Bismarck Sea, 1943.
